title: Apollyon
description: Apollyon is a mystery novel and also a psychoanalytical book. The main protagonist is undergoing therapy years later after the event, when the psychoanalyst takes him back to his childhood. The book then relates Julian's childhood and schooldays in a very revealing way. But all is not what it seems and there are snares and traps to fall into. But eventually we arrive at the truth. It is a truth somewhat hard to take as Julian's Apollyon is finally unmasked.
author: Hilary West
